meanings.definition: Glutamates: salts or esters of glutamic acid
meanings.sent1: The chef added glutamates to the dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: Many processed foods contain glutamates to enhance taste.
meanings.sent3: The glutamates in the soup danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was like a sprinkle of glutamates in her life.
meanings.sent5: The glutamates shimmered like tiny flavor crystals in the sauce.
